body_html:
I have tried this:
cd ~/models/inception
bazel build -c opt inception/imagenet_train
bazel-bin/inception/imagenet_train --num_gpus=1 --batch_size=64 --train_dir=/tmp/imagenet_train --data_dir=/data1/ImageNet

Unfortunately, the performance is still the same as my previous results.

body:
I have tried this:
cd ~/models/inception
bazel build -c opt inception/imagenet_train
bazel-bin/inception/imagenet_train --num_gpus=1 --batch_size=64 --train_dir=/tmp/imagenet_train --data_dir=/data1/ImageNet

Unfortunately, the performance is still the same as my previous results.
